TEXT.TITLE: MITSUBISHI TO ISSUE TWO CONVERTIBLE BONDS
TEXT.BODY: Mitsubishi Corp <MITT.T> said it will issue a 50 billion yen unsecured seven-year convertible bond and a 30 billion yen unsecured nine-year convertible bond on the domestic capital market through public placement with Nikko Securities Co Ltd as lead manager. Coupon and conversion price for both par-priced bonds will be set at a board meeting to be held later this month and payment is due on May 14, Mitsubishi said in a statement. The seven-year bond matures on September 30, 1994, and the nine-year bond on September 30, 1996. Mitsubishi's share price fell 30 yen to 1,200 on the Tokyo Stock Exchange today. REUTER
